trans-unit.source: Manages the collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> objects for any object that inherits from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Gestisce la raccolta di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> per qualsiasi oggetto che eredita dalla classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" />.

trans-unit.source: Each Windows Form has at least one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> object that manages the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> objects for the form.
trans-unit.target: Ogni Windows Form dispone di almeno uno <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> oggetto che gestisce il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> oggetti per il form.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> class is abstract, the return type of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> property is either a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> or a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager>.
trans-unit.target: Perché il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> classe è astratta, il tipo restituito del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> proprietà è un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager>.

trans-unit.source: If the data source is an object that can return only a single property (instead of a list of objects), the <xref:System.Type> is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager>.
trans-unit.target: Se l'origine dati è un oggetto che può restituire solo una singola proprietà (anziché un elenco di oggetti), il <xref:System.Type> è un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager>.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you specify a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> as the data source, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se si specifica un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> come origine dati, un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager> viene restituito.

trans-unit.source: On the other hand, if the data source is an object that implements <xref:System.Collections.IList> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> is returned.
trans-unit.target: D'altra parte, se l'origine dati è un oggetto che implementa <xref:System.Collections.IList> o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> viene restituito.

trans-unit.source: For each data source on a Windows Form, there is a single <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager>.
trans-unit.target: Per ogni origine dati in un Windows Form, è disponibile un singolo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyManager>.

trans-unit.source: Because there may be multiple data sources associated with a Windows Form, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> enables you to retrieve any particular <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> associated with a data source.
trans-unit.target: Poiché possono essere presenti più origini dati associate a un Windows Form, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> consente di recuperare qualsiasi particolare <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> associata a un'origine dati.

trans-unit.source: When using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> creates a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> if one does not already exist.
trans-unit.target: Quando si utilizza il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> proprietà, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> crea un nuovo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> se non ne esiste già.

trans-unit.source: This can lead to some confusion, as the returned object may not manage the list (or any list) that you intend.
trans-unit.target: Questo può causare confusione, come l'oggetto restituito non può gestire l'elenco (o qualsiasi elenco) che si desidera.

trans-unit.source: To prevent returning an invalid <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Contains%2A> method to determine if the intended <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> already exists.
trans-unit.target: Per evitare di restituire un oggetto non valido <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>, utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Contains%2A> per determinare se l'oggetto desiderato <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> esiste già.

trans-unit.source: If you use a container control, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>, to contain data-bound controls, you can create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> for just that container control and its controls.
trans-unit.target: Se si utilizza un controllo contenitore, ad esempio un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>, per contenere i controlli con associazione a dati, è possibile creare un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> solo per tale contenitore e i relativi controlli.

trans-unit.source: Then, each part of your form can be managed by its own <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>.
trans-unit.target: Quindi, ogni parte del modulo può essere gestiti dalla relativa <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>.

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.%23ctor%2A> constructor for more information about creating multiple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> objects for the same data source.
trans-unit.target: Vedere il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.%23ctor%2A> costruttore per ulteriori informazioni sulla creazione di più <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> oggetti per la stessa origine dati.

trans-unit.source: If you add a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control to a form and bind it to a column of a table in a dataset, the control communicates with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> of that form.
trans-unit.target: Se si aggiunge un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controllo a un form e l'associazione a una colonna di una tabella in un set di dati, il controllo con cui comunica il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> del modulo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>, in turn, talks to the specific <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> for that data association.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>, a sua volta comunica con la specifica <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> per tale associazione dati.

trans-unit.source: If you queried the `Position` property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>, it would report the current record for the binding of that <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: Se si esegue una query di `Position` proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>, viene registrato il record corrente per l'associazione di tale <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controllo.

trans-unit.source: In the following code example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control is bound to the `FirstName` column of a `Customers` table on the `dataSet1` dataset through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> for the form it is on.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio di codice seguente, un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> è associato al `FirstName` colonna di un `Customers` tabella il `dataSet1` set di dati tramite il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> per il form a cui appartiene.

trans-unit.source: You can add a second <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control (`TextBox2`) to the form and bind it to the `LastName` column of the `Customers` table in the same dataset.
trans-unit.target: È possibile aggiungere un secondo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controllo (`TextBox2`) al form e associarlo al `LastName` colonna il `Customers` tabella nel set di dati stesso.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> is aware of the first binding (`TextBox1` to `Customers.FirstName`), so it would use the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>, as both text boxes are bound to the same dataset (`DataSet1`).
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> è compatibile con la prima associazione (`TextBox1` a `Customers.FirstName`), quindi viene utilizzato lo stesso <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>, mentre entrambe le caselle di testo sono associate allo stesso set di dati (`DataSet1`).

trans-unit.source: If you bind `TextBox2` to a different dataset, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> creates and manages a second <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>.
trans-unit.target: Se si associa `TextBox2` un set di dati diverso, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> crea e gestisce un secondo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>.

trans-unit.source: It is important to be consistent about how you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A> properties; otherwise, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> creates multiple currency managers for the same dataset, which results in errors.
trans-unit.target: È importante essere coerente sulla modalità di impostazione di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A> proprietà; in caso contrario, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> crea valuta più gestori per il set di dati stesso, causando errori.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows a few ways to set the properties and their associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> objects.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente mostra alcuni modi per impostare le proprietà e i relativi <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: You can set the properties using either of the following methods, as long as you are consistent throughout your code.
trans-unit.target: È possibile impostare le proprietà utilizzando uno dei metodi seguenti, purché siano coerenti in tutto il codice.

trans-unit.source: Most Windows Forms applications bind through a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>.
trans-unit.target: La maggior parte delle applicazioni Windows Form associato tramite una <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> component encapsulates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> and exposes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> programming interface.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> componente incapsula un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> ed espone il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> interfaccia di programmazione.

trans-unit.source: When using a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> for binding, you should use the members exposed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> to manipulate "currency" (that is, `Position`) rather than go through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>.
trans-unit.target: Quando si utilizza un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> per l'associazione, è necessario utilizzare i membri esposti dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> per modificare la "valuta" (vale a dire `Position`) piuttosto che scorrere il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates four <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> objects to bind five controls—a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> and four <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls—to several data sources.
trans-unit.target: L'esempio di codice seguente crea quattro <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> oggetti per associare i controlli di cinque, ovvero un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> e quattro <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controlli, ovvero a diverse origini dati.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> is then used to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> for each data source.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> viene quindi utilizzato per ottenere il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> per ogni origine dati.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" />.

trans-unit.source: If you want to have multiple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> instances for the same data source, create a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> and set it to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext%2A> property of an object that inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class.
trans-unit.target: Se si desidera disporre di più <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> istanze per la stessa origine dati, creare un nuovo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> e impostarlo sul <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext%2A> proprietà di un oggetto che eredita la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> classe.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> objects (from two different <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> objects), you can set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A> properties of each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> to different values.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se si dispone di due <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> oggetti (da due diversi <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> oggetti), è possibile impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A> le proprietà di ogni <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> su valori diversi.

trans-unit.source: This causes each set of data-bound controls to display different values from the same data source.
trans-unit.target: In questo modo ogni set di controlli con associazione a dati per visualizzare valori diversi dalla stessa origine dati.

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates two new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> objects and assigns each object to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> control.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente vengono create due nuove <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> degli oggetti e assegna ogni oggetto per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> proprietà di un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> controllo.

trans-unit.source: `GroupBox1` contains `TextBox1`, and `GroupBox2` contains `TextBox2` (which is accomplished by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.AddRange%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> class).
trans-unit.target: `GroupBox1` contiene `TextBox1`, e `GroupBox2` contiene `TextBox2` (che viene eseguita utilizzando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection.AddRange%2A> metodo la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> classe).

trans-unit.source: The example then adds <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> objects to the two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls, binding each to the same data source and data member.
trans-unit.target: L'esempio aggiunge quindi <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> i due oggetti <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controlli, associazione con lo stesso membro dati e origine dati.

trans-unit.source: The example also shows two event handlers that use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> controls to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A> property on different <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> objects.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio viene inoltre due gestori di eventi che utilizzano il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> controlli per impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A> diverse proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Object" /> associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> to add.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Adds the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> associated with a specific data source to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge all'insieme l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> associato a una specifica origine dati.

trans-unit.source: The object associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> to add.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Adds the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> associated with a specific data source to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge all'insieme l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> associato a una specifica origine dati.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="dataSource" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dataSource" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: oppure

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="listManager" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="listManager" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Clears the collection of any <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Cancella dall'insieme qualunque oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />.

trans-unit.source: Clears the collection.
trans-unit.target: Cancella la raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Always raises a <see cref="T:System.NotImplementedException" /> when handled.
trans-unit.target: Genera sempre un oggetto <see cref="T:System.NotImplementedException" /> durante la gestione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.CollectionChanged> event is obsolete and always raises a <xref:System.NotImplementedException> when handled.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.CollectionChanged> evento è obsoleto e genera sempre un <xref:System.NotImplementedException> quando gestito.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla gestione degli eventi, vedere [gestione e generazione di eventi](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).

trans-unit.source: Occurs in all cases.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica in tutti i casi.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" /> contains the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l'insieme <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" /> contiene l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the data source.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Object" /> che rappresenta l'origine dati.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" /> contains the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> associated with the specified data source.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" /> contiene l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> associato all'origine dati specificata.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" /> contains the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" /> contiene l'elemento specificato <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> class for a list of possible data sources and information about creating bindings between controls and data sources.
trans-unit.target: Vedere la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> classe per un elenco di possibili origini dati e informazioni sulla creazione di associazioni tra i controlli e origini dati.

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> property for information about returning a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> using only a data source.
trans-unit.target: Vedere il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> proprietà per informazioni sulla restituzione di un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> utilizzando solo un'origine dati.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Contains%2A> method to determine whether a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> exists for each control on a form.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio di codice viene illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Contains%2A> metodo per determinare se un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> esiste per ogni controllo in un form.

trans-unit.source: The example passes each <xref:System.Data.DataTable> in a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> to the method.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio vengono passate ogni <xref:System.Data.DataTable> in un <xref:System.Data.DataSet> al metodo.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the data source.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Object" /> che rappresenta l'origine dati.

trans-unit.source: The information needed to resolve to a specific <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />.
trans-unit.target: Informazioni richieste per la risoluzione in uno specifico oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" /> contains the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> associated with the specified data source and data member.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" /> contiene l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> associato all'origine e al membro dati specificati.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" /> contains the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" /> contiene l'elemento specificato <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> class for a list of possible data sources and for information about creating bindings between controls and data sources.
trans-unit.target: Vedere la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> classe per un elenco di possibili origini dati e per informazioni sulla creazione di associazioni tra i controlli e origini dati.

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> property for information about returning a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> using a data source and data member.
trans-unit.target: Vedere il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> proprietà per informazioni sulla restituzione di un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> utilizzando un'origine dati e un membro dati.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Contains%2A> method to test whether a specific <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> exists before attempting to get it through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio di codice viene illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Contains%2A> metodo per verificare se uno specifico <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> esiste prima di tentare di ottenere il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se la raccolta è di sola lettura.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the collection is read-only; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se la raccolta è di sola lettura; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This property is derived from <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>, and is overridden to always return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è derivata da <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> e viene sottoposta a override in modo da restituire sempre `false`.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />.

trans-unit.source: The data source associated with a particular <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />.
trans-unit.target: Origine dati associata a un particolare oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> that is associated with the specified data source.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> associato all'origine dati specificata.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> for the specified data source.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> per l'origine dati specificata.

trans-unit.source: Use this overload if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> you want does not require a navigation path.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo overload se il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> desiderato non richiede un percorso di navigazione.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> manages a set of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> objects that use an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> or <xref:System.Data.DataTable> as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.DataSource%2A>, no navigation path is required.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> gestisce un set di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> gli oggetti che utilizzano un <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> o <xref:System.Data.DataTable> come il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.DataSource%2A>, è richiesto alcun percorso di navigazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> property will always return a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>, and never return `null`.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> proprietà restituirà sempre un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>e non restituiscono mai `null`.

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> class for a list of possible data sources and for information about creating bindings between controls and data sources.
trans-unit.target: Vedere la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> classe per un elenco di possibili origini dati e per informazioni sulla creazione di associazioni tra i controlli e origini dati.

trans-unit.source: The following code example returns three <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> objects: one for a <xref:System.Data.DataView>, one for an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>, and one for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.DataSource%2A> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> that belongs to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: L'esempio di codice seguente restituisce tre <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> oggetti: uno per un <xref:System.Data.DataView>, uno per un <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>e uno per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.DataSource%2A> di un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> che appartiene a un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The data source associated with a particular <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />.
trans-unit.target: Origine dati associata a un particolare oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />.

trans-unit.source: A navigation path containing the information that resolves to a specific <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />.
trans-unit.target: Percorso di navigazione contenente le informazioni che vengono risolte in uno specifico oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> that is associated with the specified data source and data member.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> associato all'origine e al membro dati specificati.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> for the specified data source and data member.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> per l'origine e il membro dati specificati.

trans-unit.source: Use this overload when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> manages a set of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> objects for which the data source contains multiple objects.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo overload quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> gestisce un set di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> oggetti per cui l'origine dati contenente più oggetti.

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> can contain several <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects linked by <xref:System.Data.DataRelation> objects.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, un <xref:System.Data.DataSet> può contenere diversi <xref:System.Data.DataTable> oggetti collegati da <xref:System.Data.DataRelation> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: In such a case, the navigation path is required to enable the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> to return the correct <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>.
trans-unit.target: In tal caso, il percorso di navigazione è richiesto per consentire il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> per restituire il corretto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> property will always return a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>, when the `dataMember` parameter is valid.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> proprietà restituirà sempre un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>, quando il `dataMember` parametro è valido.

trans-unit.source: It will never return `null`.
trans-unit.target: Non restituisce mai `null`.

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> class for a list of possible data sources and for information about creating bindings between controls and data sources.
trans-unit.target: Vedere la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> classe per un elenco di possibili origini dati e per informazioni sulla creazione di associazioni tra i controlli e origini dati.

trans-unit.source: If the desired <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> manages a list, the navigation path must also end with a list.
trans-unit.target: Se l'oggetto desiderato <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> gestisce un elenco, anche il percorso di navigazione deve terminare con un elenco.

trans-unit.source: For example, the following C# code binds a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control to the order date in a table of orders.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, il codice c# seguente associa un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controllo alla data dell'ordine in una tabella degli ordini.

trans-unit.source: The navigation path includes the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>, the <xref:System.Data.DataRelation.RelationName%2A>, and the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Include il percorso di navigazione di <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>, <xref:System.Data.DataRelation.RelationName%2A>e <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>.

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> must be retrieved using only the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> and <xref:System.Data.DataRelation.RelationName%2A> (which resolves to a list).
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> deve essere recuperato utilizzando solo il <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> e <xref:System.Data.DataRelation.RelationName%2A> (che viene risolta in un elenco).

trans-unit.source: When returning a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>, you should use the same data source as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> and modify only the navigation path.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene restituito un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>, è necessario utilizzare la stessa origine dati come il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> e modificare il percorso di navigazione.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Contains%2A> method to determine if the desired <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> already exists.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Contains%2A> per determinare se l'oggetto desiderato <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> esiste già.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> to retrieve the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> for a particular binding.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.Item%2A> per recuperare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> per una determinata associazione.

trans-unit.source: It also shows how to handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.BindingComplete> event for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> to ensure multiple controls bound to the same data source remain synchronized when one of the control values is changed.
trans-unit.target: Viene inoltre illustrato come gestire il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.BindingComplete> evento per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> per assicurare più controlli associati alla stessa origine dati rimangano sincronizzati quando uno dei valori di controllo viene modificato.

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form and call the `InitializeControlsAndData` method from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event-handling method.
trans-unit.target: Per eseguire questo esempio, incollare il codice in un Windows Form e chiamare il `InitializeControlsAndData` metodo dal costruttore del form o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> il metodo di gestione degli eventi.

trans-unit.source: The specified <paramref name="dataMember" /> does not exist within the data source.
trans-unit.target: Il parametro <paramref name="dataMember" /> specificato non esiste nell'origine dati.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs" /> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.CollectionChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera l'evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.CollectionChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene generato un evento, il gestore dell'evento viene richiamato tramite un delegato.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [gestione e generazione di eventi](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.OnCollectionChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.OnCollectionChanged%2A> consente inoltre alle classi derivate di gestire l'evento senza associare un delegato.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: È la tecnica consigliata per la gestione dell'evento in una classe derivata.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.OnCollectionChanged(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.OnCollectionChanged(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando si esegue l'override di <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.OnCollectionChanged(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" /> in una classe derivata, verificare di chiamare il metodo <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.OnCollectionChanged(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" /> della classe di base in modo che i delegati registrati ricevano l'evento.

trans-unit.source: The data source associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> to remove.
trans-unit.target: Origine dati associata all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> da rimuovere.

trans-unit.source: Deletes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> associated with the specified data source.
trans-unit.target: Elimina l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> associato all'origine dati specificata.

trans-unit.source: The data source associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> to remove.
trans-unit.target: Origine dati associata all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> da rimuovere.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> associated with the specified data source.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase" /> associato all'origine dati specificata.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to copy into.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Array" /> in cui eseguire la copia.

trans-unit.source: The collection index to begin copying from.
trans-unit.target: Indice dell'insieme dal quale iniziare la copia.

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of the collection into a specified array, starting at the collection index.
trans-unit.target: Copia gli elementi della raccolta in una matrice specificata, a partire dall'indice della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" /> objects managed by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il numero complessivo di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" /> gestiti da <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" />.

trans-unit.source: The number of data sources managed by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" />.
trans-unit.target: Numero di origini dati gestite da <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example returns the number of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> objects managed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente restituisce il numero di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> gli oggetti gestiti dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the collection is synchronized.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se la raccolta è sincronizzata.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the collection is thread safe; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se l'insieme è thread-safe; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This property is derived from <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>, and is overridden to always return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è derivata da <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> e viene sottoposta a override in modo da restituire sempre `false`.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object to use for synchronization (thread safety).
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un oggetto da usare per la sincronizzazione (thread safety).

trans-unit.source: This property is derived from <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" />, and is overridden to always return <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è derivata da <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> e viene sottoposta a override in modo da restituire sempre <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator for the collection.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un enumeratore per la raccolta.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> for the collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> per l'insieme.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.System%23Collections%23IEnumerable%23GetEnumerator%2A> method allows you to iterate over the collection managed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> restituito dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.System%23Collections%23IEnumerable%23GetEnumerator%2A> metodo consente di scorrere la raccolta gestita dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.System%23Collections%23IEnumerable%23GetEnumerator%2A> method to return an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio di codice viene illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.System%23Collections%23IEnumerable%23GetEnumerator%2A> per restituire un <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>.

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" /> to associate with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" />.
trans-unit.target: Nuovo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" /> da associare a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" /> to associate with the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" /> da associare al nuovo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" />.

trans-unit.source: Associates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" /> with a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" />.
trans-unit.target: Associa un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Binding" /> a un nuovo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is intended update the bindings of components that implement <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent>, when their <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> changes.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo deve aggiornare le associazioni dei componenti che implementano <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent>, quando i relativi <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> le modifiche.
